pages.text: $(li)Flint is a sedimentary rock.$(br)$(li)It can be obtained when you break a block of Gravel or be found around the world.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/fletcher)Fletchers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:villagers/leatherworker)Leatherworkers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:villagers/toolsmith)Toolsmiths$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:villagers/weaponsmith)Weaponsmiths$(/l) will exchange this item by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
